entry.def: Lebanese means belonging or relating to Lebanon, or to its people or culture.
A Lebanese is a Lebanese citizen, or a person of Lebanese origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Lebanon
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Lebanon or its people;
